author: Joe Flint
title: ABCâ€™s Bruce Rosenblum to Exit Disney Amid Restructuring
text:
Bruce Rosenblum is exiting as president of business operations for the Disney/ABC Television Group after less than two years in the position.
The departure comes two months after parent company Walt Disney Co. reorganized its operations, a move that resulted in Mr. Rosenblum losing key areas of responsibility including oversight of advertising sales, distribution and digital-media strategy for the unit.
